sentence: Mr. SCHIFF. Madam President, Members, welcome to the roaring  twenties, not the ones you may have read about in F. Scott Fitzgerald  novels, not the ones with jazz and liberation and industrial boom. I  mean these roaring twenties--the ones where instead of flappers, you  get fossil fuel and dirty air;…
